tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_recall_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_make VARCHAR(255),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(255),
    recall_description TEXT,
    recall_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleRecalls (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_make VARCHAR(255),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(255),
    recall_date DATE,
    reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_recall_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    recall_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recalls (
    recall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    recall_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleRecalls (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    recall_date DATE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RecallDetails (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    recall_id INT REFERENCES VehicleRecalls(id),
    reason_id INT REFERENCES RecallReasons(id),
    status_id INT REFERENCES RecallStatus(id),
    details TEXT
);
